page.title: 09WOMENS INSTITUTES
page.content: There are two Women's Institutes in the area, Ashley-with-Studdal W.I. and Mongeham and Ripple W.I.. Women's Institutes are associations for women only for the purpose of education. They are a part of the National Federation of Women's Institutes. Most Institutes meet monthly and usually hear a talk by a Speaker or Demonstrator on a wide variety of subjects. They also provide time for members to communicate with each other. W.I.s are non-party political and non- sectarian but concern themselves with a wide range of contemporary issues, working towards the improvement of community life. The motto is "For Home and Country".
